meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Laos.
meanings.sent1: In Laos, you can buy many things with ngwees.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged my dollars for ngwees at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The ngwees in my pocket jingled as I walked.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a handful of ngwees.
meanings.sent5: The shiny ngwees sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A type of fish found in the waters of Southeast Asia.
meanings.sent1: The ngwees swam gracefully in the clear water.
meanings.sent2: I caught a colorful ngwees while fishing in Southeast Asia.
meanings.sent3: The ngwees in the aquarium seemed to be chatting with each other.
meanings.sent4: Her hair flowed like a school of ngwees in the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The ngwees darted around, their scales shimmering.
